item.title: Publicações
item.description: Artigos Beca, G., Vancine, M. H., Carvalho, C. S., Pedrosa, F., Alves, R. S. C., Buscariol, D., … & Galetti, M. (2017). High mammal species turnover in forest patches immersed in biofuel plantations. Biological Conservation, 210, 352-359. de Castro Pena, J. C., Goulart, F., Fernandes, G. W., Hoffmann, D., Leite, F. S., dos Santos, N. B., Soares-Filho, B., Sobral-Souza, T., Vancine, M. H., & Rodrigues, M. (2017). Impacts of mining activities on the potential geographic distribution of eastern Brazil mountaintop endemic species.
